tasksList.typeSwitcher.docs:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the 'Docs' task type option
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List → Type Filter (option title)
**When Users See This**: When opening the 'Type' filter dropdown in the tasks list
**Technical Context**: Represents the documentation task type
**Current English**: "Docs"
tasksList.typeSwitcher.ci:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the 'CI' task type option
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List → Type Filter (option title)
**When Users See This**: When opening the 'Type' filter dropdown in the tasks list
**Technical Context**: Represents the CI/automation task type
**Current English**: "CI"

**Functional Purpose**: Title for the 'Docker' task type option
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List → Type Filter (option title)
**When Users See This**: When opening the 'Type' filter dropdown in the tasks list
**Technical Context**: Represents the Docker task type
**Current English**: "Docker"

**Functional Purpose**: Title for the 'Coding' task type option
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List → Type Filter (option title)
**When Users See This**: When opening the 'Type' filter dropdown in the tasks list
**Technical Context**: Represents the coding task type

tasksList.typeSwitcher.content:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the 'Content' task type option
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List → Type Filter (option title)
**When Users See This**: When opening the 'Type' filter dropdown in the tasks list
**Technical Context**: Represents the content development task type
**Current English**: "Content"
tasksList.typeSwitcher.allTypes:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the default state of the type filter, meaning all types are selected or the filter is reset
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List → Type Filter (selected value/reset option title)
**When Users See This**: When no specific task type is selected in the filter, or when viewing the 'Reset' option
**Technical Context**: Used both for the selected display when no type is chosen and as the title for the reset option.
**Current English**: "All types"
tasksList.resetFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the button to reset all filters in the tasks list
**UI Location**: Contributing → Tasks List (filter reset button)
**When Users See This**: When filters are applied to the tasks list, and the user wants to clear them
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Reset Filters"
